text:
Standoff in the Mist

A tense encounter in a foggy street  
Svidrigaïlov holds a revolver.  
Achilles: “What do you want here?”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Nothing, brother, good morning.”  
Achilles: “This isn’t the place.”  

Svidrigaïlov: “I’m going to America.”  
Achilles: “America?”  

Svidrigaïlov: “Why not here?”  
Achilles: “Because it isn’t!”  

Svidrigaïlov: “It’s a good place.”  
Achilles: “You can’t do it here!”  

Svidrigaïlov pulls the trigger.  
Achilles’ eyes widen in shock.  

---  

A quiet moment after the shot  
Silence hangs in the air.  
Achilles: “No… what have you done?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Svidrigaïlov, contemplating suicide, confronts Achilles while preparing to use a revolver.
